Description: Available September 1st. 1 Bedroom apartment available now. Ideal for one person. Included in the rent is heat, electricity, water/sewer and 1 off street parking space. Lower level unit consisting of 1 bedroom, 1 full bathroom, kitchen, living room and small office area. No outside space. No pets and no smoking. Washer and dryer in the unit. Kitchen includes stove and fridge. Short walk to Newton Corner for Bus and not far from train. No fee. First, last and security required. Complete Landlord Rental application and full credit report required. Please do not walk on the property without first contacting me. Thank you!
